Carlsbad.Carlsbad Poinsettia station:
Carlsbad Poinsettia is one of two passenger rail stations serving the city of Carlsbad, California on North County Transit District's COASTER and Amtrak's Pacific Surfliner lines. North County Transit District's Breeze buses serves three route to Legoland California, Palomar College and Faraday Center.
On October 7, 2013, Amtrak began making stops with its Pacific Surfliner train.
